content: pencil gnome keychain > **for the free pattern click here 1 ** this adorable pencil gnome keychain is a quick and easy crochet project that makes the perfect gift for teachers students or gnome lovers designed as part of my school-themed gnome collection it works up in just 30 40 minutes and uses only about 25g of yarn the finished keychain measures approx 9 cm 3 5 tall when made with sport weight cotton yarn and a 2 75 mm hook the pattern includes a fun variation to create a pencil-only keychain using the same base materials sport weight cotton yarn e g hobbii cotton friends or rainbow cotton 8/6 2 75 mm crochet hook fiberfill stuffing yarn needle scissors keyring or clasp optional skills needed basic amigurumi techniques working in the round increasing/decreasing yarn under method explained in the pattern for tight sturdy stitches this is a great stash-buster perfect for gift sets craft markets or just to add a little handmade charm to your keys or bag 1 https //www passionatecrafter com/free-crochet-pattern-pencil-gnome-keychain-perfect-for-teachers-gifts/
